{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-13T13:59:23.000Z", "description": "
Hi,

We are have an opportunity for the below job. We will request you to revert back with your resume.

Position: Data Scientist
Location: Plano TX (Currently Remote \u2013 Will be Onsite until the further announcement.
Duration: Long Term
Job Description:

Duties to Perform
\u2022\tBuild proof-of-concept models using a prototype infrastructure
\u2022\tBring proof-of-concept models into production using prototype infrastructure
\u2022\tCommunicate shortcomings or improvements to multi-language API for database interaction
\u2022\tBuild proof-of-concept feature engineering batch and streaming jobs
\u2022\tCreate and present Powerpoint decks describing work to both technical and non-technical audiences
\u2022\tAssist in design and brainstorming sessions for prototype capabilities

Required Skill & Experience
\u2022\tExpert in Azure Cloud (*Machine Learning*: Event Hub/Streaming Analytics, HDI, DB, Azure ML, Azure Log Analytics, Databricks)
\u2022\tStrong statistics and machine learning fundamentals
\u2022\tDemonstrated experience putting models into real-time production
\u2022\tExperience with Python required; R, Scala, and (Java nice to have)
\u2022\tExperience with Spark DataFrame and SQL API's required. Spark streaming/structured streaming are nice to have
\u2022\tExperience with Azure Cloud
\u2022\tExperience with Databricks(Spark, Delta Lake, MLFlow)
\u2022\tExperience with H2O Driverless AI
\u2022\tExperience with Kafka/Azure Event Hub
\u2022\tStrong Team Player
\u2022\tStrong problem-solving skills
\u2022\tStrong communication skills and the ability to describe shortcomings in system design
\u2022\tA strong desire and ability to learn new tools and technologies.
\u2022\tAirflow experience is nice to have

Technical Environment
\u2022\tAzure
\u2022\tSQL / Mongo DB
\u2022\tPython / Pyspark
\u2022\tKafka / EventHub
\u2022\tLinux and Shell Scripting
\u2022\tPossibly R, Scala and Java
\u2022\tDatabricks
\u2022\tAzure data production and consumption tools (Event Hub, Azure Functions, Streaming Analytics,

Regards,
Suganya

What's app :91 9043392040.
